scripts.python3-first-timer: yarn install && python3 -m venv env && . env/scripts/activate && pip3 install -r requirements.txt
scripts.py-first-timer: yarn install && py -m venv env && . env/scripts/activate && pip3 install -r requirements.txt
scripts.python3-start-server: python3 manage.py makemigrations && python3 manage.py migrate && python3 manage.py runserver
scripts.py-start-server: py manage.py makemigrations && py manage.py migrate && py manage.py runserver
